meanings.definition: The quality or state of being able to be extended.
meanings.sent1: Her extendabilities in yoga allowed her to effortlessly touch her toes.
meanings.sent2: The extendabilities of the bridge were tested by engineers before opening it to traffic.
meanings.sent3: His extendabilities in storytelling made him the life of the party.
meanings.sent4: The extendabilities of his patience seemed endless, like a bottomless well.
meanings.sent5: The extendabilities of the rubber band were put to the test as it stretched further than expected.

meanings.definition: The range or scope of something that can be extended.
meanings.sent1: The extendabilities of the project surprised everyone with its vast reach.
meanings.sent2: When discussing budget, they considered the extendabilities of their expenses.
meanings.sent3: The extendabilities of the buffet left everyone feeling full and satisfied.
meanings.sent4: The extendabilities of her knowledge extended far beyond what was expected.
meanings.sent5: The extendabilities of the forest seemed to stretch endlessly into the horizon.
